sn22.84:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena ayasma tisso bhagavato pitucchaputto sambahulanam bhikkhunam evamaroceti:
sn22.84:1.3: “api me, avuso, madhurakajato viya kayo; disapi me na pakkhayanti; dhammapi mam na patibhanti; thinamiddhanca me cittam pariyadaya titthati; anabhirato ca brahmacariyam carami; hoti ca me dhammesu vicikiccha”ti.
sn22.84:2.1: Atha kho sambahula bhikkhu yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidimsu. Ekamantam nisinna kho te bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavocum:
sn22.84:2.2: “ayasma, bhante, tisso bhagavato pitucchaputto sambahulanam bhikkhunam evamaroceti:
sn22.84:2.3: ‘api me, avuso, madhurakajato viya kayo; disapi me na pakkhayanti; dhammapi mam na patibhanti; thinamiddhanca me cittam pariyadaya titthati; anabhirato ca brahmacariyam carami; hoti ca me dhammesu vicikiccha’”ti.
sn22.84:3.1: Atha kho bhagava annataram bhikkhum amantesi:
sn22.84:3.2: “ehi tvam, bhikkhu, mama vacanena tissam bhikkhum amantehi”ti.
sn22.84:3.3: “Evam, bhante”ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato patissutva yenayasma tisso tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmantam tissam etadavoca:
sn22.84:3.5: “Evamavuso”ti kho ayasma tisso tassa bhikkhuno patissutva yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinnam kho ayasmantam tissam bhagava etadavoca:
sn22.84:3.6: “saccam kira tvam, tissa, sambahulanam bhikkhunam evamarocesi:
sn22.84:3.7: ‘api me, avuso, madhurakajato viya kayo …pe… hoti ca me dhammesu vicikiccha’”ti?
sn22.84:3.10: rupe avigataragassa avigatacchandassa avigatapemassa avigatapipasassa avigataparilahassa avigatatanhassa, tassa rupassa viparinamannathabhava uppajjanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasa”ti?
sn22.84:5.3: Yatha tam sankharesu anigataragassa, vinnane avigataragassa avigatacchandassa avigatapemassa avigatapipasassa avigataparilahassa avigatatanhassa, tassa vinnanassa viparinamannathabhava uppajjanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasa”ti?
sn22.84:6.5: rupe vigataragassa vigatacchandassa vigatapemassa vigatapipasassa vigataparilahassa vigatatanhassa, tassa rupassa viparinamannathabhava uppajjanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasa”ti?
sn22.84:7.7: vinnane vigataragassa vigatacchandassa vigatapemassa vigatapipasassa vigataparilahassa vigatatanhassa tassa vinnanassa viparinamannathabhava uppajjanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasa”ti?
sn22.84:9.2: eko puriso amaggakusalo, eko puriso maggakusalo.
sn22.84:9.3: Tamenam so amaggakusalo puriso amum maggakusalam purisam maggam puccheyya.
sn22.84:9.7: Tena muhuttam gantva dakkhissasi dvedhapatham, tattha vamam muncitva dakkhinam ganhahi.
sn22.84:9.9: Tena muhuttam gantva dakkhissasi tibbam vanasandam.
sn22.84:9.11: Tena muhuttam gantva dakkhissasi mahantam ninnam pallalam.
sn22.84:9.13: Tena muhuttam gantva dakkhissasi sobbham papatam.
sn22.84:9.15: Tena muhuttam gantva dakkhissasi samam bhumibhagam ramaniyan’ti.
sn22.84:10.1: Upama kho myayam, tissa, kata atthassa vinnapanaya.
sn22.84:10.4: ‘Puriso maggakusalo’ti kho, tissa, tathagatassetam adhivacanam arahato sammasambuddhassa.
sn22.84:10.6: ‘Vamo maggo’ti kho, tissa, atthangikassetam micchamaggassa adhivacanam, seyyathidam—
sn22.84:10.8: ‘Dakkhino maggo’ti kho, tissa, ariyassetam atthangikassa maggassa adhivacanam, seyyathidam—
sn22.84:10.11: ‘Mahantam ninnam pallalan’ti kho, tissa, kamanametam adhivacanam.
sn22.84:10.13: ‘Samo bhumibhago ramaniyo’ti kho, tissa, nibbanassetam adhivacanam.
sn22.84:11.2: Attamano ayasma tisso bhagavato bhasitam abhinanditi.
